global_caption: a scene featuring a grandfather with white hair, wearing a black beret hat, a grey cardigan, navy pants, and black shoes, looking at the right side; a mother with a smiling face, brown skin, black hair, wearing a white dress with small pink flowers and a green leaves pattern, holding the father's hand with her right hand, looking at the front side; a father with a smiling face, brown skin, black curly short hair, wearing a blue t-shirt, ivory short pants, and black sandals, holding the mother's hand with his left hand, also holding a big basket in his left hand, and carrying a lot of bottles of water on board, looking at the front side; and a girl with brown skin, black short hair, wearing pink sleeves and a white lacy skirt, pink shoes, holding a teddy bear in her left hand and a yellow balloon in her right hand, looking at the front side.
